modName: Missy The Dragonborn Save Game All Finished
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]Sliders added in pics.
Also some how two files were uploaded. guess i did something wrong. I think the top file is the correct file.

Before i start i have no idea what im doing so if i make a mistake please advise me where i went wrong, no being rude, ok.
Going through our old Saves I found this save which i thought would be good of here for testing Mods out.

Sick of starting a new game over and over. 
Just want to get in and start testing Mods, Try this game.

My hubby, Unspacey, is fighting Advanced Prostate Cancer and is having a tough time. This is one of his games. I am planning on making a quest mod soon, if things go according to plan.[/size][/font] [font=Comic Sans MS][size=3] [u][b]That means i have to learn to mod first[/b][/u][/size][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]To make your character look like this one

[b][u]Oh, one more thing. Dont be afraid of a small Prick. Check your prostate guys. [/u][/b][/size][/font][/center]

[center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4][b]Race[/b]; Nord
All items in [b]Breezehome.[/b]
[b]REQ-Dawnguard,Hearthfire,Dragonborn and USLEEP[/b]
The Eyes of beauty
KS Hairs
True brows
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]No Cheating



[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]Download, Unzip, ( I prefer 7zip because it is free and it also opens .zip and .rar files http://www.7-zip.org/) Copy and paste or drag and drop the save game file to your save game folder (Usually C:\Users\your user profile name\Documents\MyGames\Skyrim\Saves) and then play Skyrim.[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]
[/size][/font][/center]
